text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core R0. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-61-R0GX 17.3" FHD IPS RX Vega 56 8 GB VRAM AMD Ryzen 7 2700 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Fortnite. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 500 PH517-61-R0GX 17.3" FHD IPS RX Vega 56 8 GB VRAM AMD Ryzen 7 2700 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
